metadata.title: CVE-2023-31484 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
CPAN.pm before 2.35 does not verify TLS certificates when downloadingdistributions over HTTPS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.22 - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2
perl - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2
perl-base - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2
perl-debug - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2
perl-modules-5.22 - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: perl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.22.1-9ubuntu0.9+esm2').
